headline.main: NEW ZEALAND GETS BRITISH AID PLEDGE; High Commissioner Promises Full Support Against Invasion

lead_paragraph: WELLINGTON, N.Z., April 2 -- All-out support for New Zealand in the event of invasion has been pledged by the British High Commissioner, Sir Harry Batterbee, in a speech at Christchurch. This is believed to indicate an improvement of the British position in the war in the Pacific.
abstract: Brit High Comr Sir H Batterbee pledges Brit aid to N Z in event of invasion
